summary: The test suite verifies the Gemini LLM integration's handling of different mode configurations, emphasizing nested and complex Pydantic models. It defines test cases that build nested data structures and asserts that mode processing yields the expected results.
business_intent: Confirm that the Gemini LLM wrapper correctly serializes and deserializes nested Pydantic models across various operational modes, ensuring reliable behavior for applications that rely on structured data exchange.
